trans-unit.source: Use Script Action to install Solr on Hadoop cluster | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use Script Action to install Solr on Hadoop cluster | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to customize HDInsight cluster with Solr.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to customize HDInsight cluster with Solr.

trans-unit.source: You'll use a Script Action configuration option to use a script to install Solr.
trans-unit.target: You'll use a Script Action configuration option to use a script to install Solr.

trans-unit.source: Install and use Solr on HDInsight Hadoop clusters
trans-unit.target: Install and use Solr on HDInsight Hadoop clusters

trans-unit.source: Learn how to customize Windows based HDInsight cluster with Solr using Script Action, and how to use Solr to search data.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to customize Windows based HDInsight cluster with Solr using Script Action, and how to use Solr to search data.

trans-unit.source: For information on using Solr with a Linux-based cluster, see [Install and use Solr on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install-linux.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on using Solr with a Linux-based cluster, see [Install and use Solr on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install-linux.md).

trans-unit.source: You can install Solr on any type of cluster (Hadoop, Storm, HBase, Spark) on Azure HDInsight by using *Script Action*.
trans-unit.target: You can install Solr on any type of cluster (Hadoop, Storm, HBase, Spark) on Azure HDInsight by using *Script Action*.

trans-unit.source: A sample script to install Solr on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1).
trans-unit.target: A sample script to install Solr on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1).

trans-unit.source: The sample script works only with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.
trans-unit.target: The sample script works only with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.

trans-unit.source: For more information on HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).

trans-unit.source: The sample script used in this topic creates a Windows-based Solr cluster with a specific configuration.
trans-unit.target: The sample script used in this topic creates a Windows-based Solr cluster with a specific configuration.

trans-unit.source: If you want to configure the Solr cluster with different collections, shards, schemas, replicas, etc., you must modify the script and Solr binaries accordingly.
trans-unit.target: If you want to configure the Solr cluster with different collections, shards, schemas, replicas, etc., you must modify the script and Solr binaries accordingly.

trans-unit.source: **Related articles**
trans-unit.target: **Related articles**

trans-unit.target: [Install Solr on HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install.md): install Solr on HDInsight cluster using the Azure Portal

trans-unit.target: [Install and use Solr on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install-linux.md)

trans-unit.target: [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md): general information on creating HDInsight clusters

trans-unit.source: [Customize HDInsight cluster using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize]: general information on customizing HDInsight clusters using Script Action
trans-unit.target: [Customize HDInsight cluster using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize]: general information on customizing HDInsight clusters using Script Action

trans-unit.source: [Develop Script Action scripts for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md)
trans-unit.target: [Develop Script Action scripts for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md)

trans-unit.source: What is Solr?
trans-unit.target: What is Solr?

trans-unit.source: [Apache Solr](http://lucene.apache.org/solr/features.html) is an enterprise search platform that enables powerful full-text search on data.
trans-unit.target: [Apache Solr](http://lucene.apache.org/solr/features.html) is an enterprise search platform that enables powerful full-text search on data.

trans-unit.source: While Hadoop enables storing and managing vast amounts of data, Apache Solr provides the search capabilities to quickly retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: While Hadoop enables storing and managing vast amounts of data, Apache Solr provides the search capabilities to quickly retrieve the data.

trans-unit.source: Install Solr using portal
trans-unit.target: Install Solr using portal

trans-unit.source: [Install Solr on HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install.md)
trans-unit.target: [Install Solr on HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install.md)

trans-unit.source: Start creating a cluster by using the **CUSTOM CREATE** option, as described at [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#portal).
trans-unit.target: Start creating a cluster by using the **CUSTOM CREATE** option, as described at [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#portal).

trans-unit.source: On the **Script Actions** page of the wizard, click **add script action** to provide details about the script action, as shown below:
trans-unit.target: On the **Script Actions** page of the wizard, click **add script action** to provide details about the script action, as shown below:

trans-unit.source: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install-v1/hdi-script-action-solr.png "Use Script Action to customize a cluster")
trans-unit.target: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install-v1/hdi-script-action-solr.png "Use Script Action to customize a cluster")

trans-unit.source:
PropertyValue
Name Specify a name for the script action.
trans-unit.target:
PropertyValue
Name Specify a name for the script action.

trans-unit.source: For example, Install Solr. Script URI Specify the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster.
trans-unit.target: For example, Install Solr. Script URI Specify the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster.

trans-unit.source: For example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1 Node Type Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.
trans-unit.target: For example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1 Node Type Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.

trans-unit.source: You can choose All nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.
trans-unit.target: You can choose All nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.

trans-unit.source: Parameters Specify the parameters, if required by the script.
trans-unit.target: Parameters Specify the parameters, if required by the script.

trans-unit.source: The script to install Solr does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.
trans-unit.target: The script to install Solr does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.

trans-unit.source: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: After you have added the scripts, click the checkmark to start creating the cluster.
trans-unit.target: After you have added the scripts, click the checkmark to start creating the cluster.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the script to install Solr on HDInsight by using Azure PowerShell or the HDInsight .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the script to install Solr on HDInsight by using Azure PowerShell or the HDInsight .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: Instructions for these procedures are provided later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Instructions for these procedures are provided later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: Use Solr
trans-unit.target: Use Solr

trans-unit.source: You must start with indexing Solr with some data files.
trans-unit.target: You must start with indexing Solr with some data files.

trans-unit.source: You can then use Solr to run search queries on the indexed data.
trans-unit.target: You can then use Solr to run search queries on the indexed data.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to use Solr in an HDInsight cluster:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to use Solr in an HDInsight cluster:

trans-unit.source: **Use Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) to remote into the HDInsight cluster with Solr installed**.
trans-unit.target: **Use Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) to remote into the HDInsight cluster with Solr installed**.

trans-unit.source: From the Azure portal, enable Remote Desktop for the cluster you created with Solr installed, and then remote into the cluster.
trans-unit.target: From the Azure portal, enable Remote Desktop for the cluster you created with Solr installed, and then remote into the cluster.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see [Connect to HDInsight clusters using RDP](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#rdp).
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see [Connect to HDInsight clusters using RDP](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#rdp).

trans-unit.source: **Index Solr by uploading data files**.
trans-unit.target: **Index Solr by uploading data files**.

trans-unit.source: When you index Solr, you put documents in it that you may need to search on.
trans-unit.target: When you index Solr, you put documents in it that you may need to search on.

trans-unit.source: To index Solr, use RDP to remote into the cluster, navigate to the desktop, open the Hadoop command line, and navigate to **C:\apps\dist\solr-4.7.2\example\exampledocs**.
trans-unit.target: To index Solr, use RDP to remote into the cluster, navigate to the desktop, open the Hadoop command line, and navigate to **C:\apps\dist\solr-4.7.2\example\exampledocs**.

trans-unit.source: Run the following command:
trans-unit.target: Run the following command:

trans-unit.source: You'll see the following output on the console:
trans-unit.target: You'll see the following output on the console:

trans-unit.source: The post.jar utility indexes Solr with two sample documents, **solr.xml** and **monitor.xml**.
trans-unit.target: The post.jar utility indexes Solr with two sample documents, **solr.xml** and **monitor.xml**.

trans-unit.source: The post.jar utility and the sample documents are available with Solr installation.
trans-unit.target: The post.jar utility and the sample documents are available with Solr installation.

trans-unit.source: **Use the Solr dashboard to search within the indexed documents**.
trans-unit.target: **Use the Solr dashboard to search within the indexed documents**.

trans-unit.source: In the RDP session to the HDInsight cluster, open Internet Explorer, and launch the Solr dashboard at **http://headnodehost:8983/solr/#/**.
trans-unit.target: In the RDP session to the HDInsight cluster, open Internet Explorer, and launch the Solr dashboard at **http://headnodehost:8983/solr/#/**.

trans-unit.source: From the left pane, from the **Core Selector** drop-down, select **collection1**, and within that, click **Query**.
trans-unit.target: From the left pane, from the **Core Selector** drop-down, select **collection1**, and within that, click **Query**.

trans-unit.source: As an example, to select and return all the docs in Solr, provide the following values:
trans-unit.target: As an example, to select and return all the docs in Solr, provide the following values:

trans-unit.source: In the **q** text box, enter **\*:**\*.
trans-unit.target: In the **q** text box, enter **\*:**\*.

trans-unit.source: This will return all the documents that are indexed in Solr.
trans-unit.target: This will return all the documents that are indexed in Solr.

trans-unit.source: If you want to search for a specific string within the documents, you can enter that string here.
trans-unit.target: If you want to search for a specific string within the documents, you can enter that string here.

trans-unit.source: In the **wt** text box, select the output format.
trans-unit.target: In the **wt** text box, select the output format.

trans-unit.source: Default is **json**.
trans-unit.target: Default is **json**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Execute Query**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Execute Query**.

trans-unit.source: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install-v1/hdi-solr-dashboard-query.png "Run a query on Solr dashboard")
trans-unit.target: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install-v1/hdi-solr-dashboard-query.png "Run a query on Solr dashboard")

trans-unit.source: The output returns the two docs that we used for indexing Solr.
trans-unit.target: The output returns the two docs that we used for indexing Solr.

trans-unit.source: The output resembles the following:
trans-unit.target: The output resembles the following:

trans-unit.source: **Recommended: Back up the indexed data from Solr to Azure Blob storage associated with the HDInsight cluster**.
trans-unit.target: **Recommended: Back up the indexed data from Solr to Azure Blob storage associated with the HDInsight cluster**.

trans-unit.source: As a good practice, you should back up the indexed data from the Solr cluster nodes onto Azure Blob storage.
trans-unit.target: As a good practice, you should back up the indexed data from the Solr cluster nodes onto Azure Blob storage.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to do so:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to do so:

trans-unit.source: From the RDP session, open Internet Explorer, and point to the following URL:
trans-unit.target: From the RDP session, open Internet Explorer, and point to the following URL:

trans-unit.source: You should see a response like this:
trans-unit.target: You should see a response like this:

trans-unit.source: In the remote session, navigate to {SOLR_HOME}\{Collection}\data.
trans-unit.target: In the remote session, navigate to {SOLR_HOME}\{Collection}\data.

trans-unit.source: For the cluster created via the sample script, this should be **C:\apps\dist\solr-4.7.2\example\solr\collection1\data**.
trans-unit.target: For the cluster created via the sample script, this should be **C:\apps\dist\solr-4.7.2\example\solr\collection1\data**.

trans-unit.source: At this location, you should see a snapshot folder created with a name similar to **snapshot.*timestamp***.
trans-unit.target: At this location, you should see a snapshot folder created with a name similar to **snapshot.*timestamp***.

trans-unit.source: Zip the snapshot folder and upload it to Azure Blob storage.
trans-unit.target: Zip the snapshot folder and upload it to Azure Blob storage.

trans-unit.source: From the Hadoop command line, navigate to the location of the snapshot folder by using the following command:
trans-unit.target: From the Hadoop command line, navigate to the location of the snapshot folder by using the following command:

trans-unit.source: This command copies the snapshot to /example/data/ under the container within the default Storage account associated with the cluster.
trans-unit.target: This command copies the snapshot to /example/data/ under the container within the default Storage account associated with the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Install Solr using Aure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Install Solr using Aure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_powershell).

trans-unit.source: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1).
trans-unit.target: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1).

trans-unit.source: Install Sole using .NET SDK
trans-unit.target: Install Sole using .NET SDK

trans-unit.source: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_azure_powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_azure_powershell).

trans-unit.source: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using the .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using the .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1).
trans-unit.target: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/solrconfigactionv01/solr-installer-v01.ps1).
